Actions.Description: Creates a new DLP policy.

Actions.Description: Sets permissions for an Environment.

Actions.Description: Returns a list of all Tenant and Environment DLP Policies.

Actions.Description: Returns a list of Environments.

Actions.Description: Returns a list of permissions for an Environment without CDS for Apps.

Actions.Description: Used to check the status of an environment operation, sucn as deletion.

Actions.Name: Get Environment DLP Policy
Actions.Description: Returns an Environment DLP Policy.

Actions.Name: Get Lifecycle Operation Status
Actions.Description: Returns the current status of the lifecycle operation that occurs after an environment patch.

Actions.Description: Returns a DLP Policy.

Actions.Description: Used to check the status of a provisioning operation.

Actions.Description: Used to check the status of a provisioning operation.

Actions.Name: Get Environment as Admin
Actions.Description: Returns a single Environment as Admin.

Actions.Description: Returns a Tenant DLP Policy.

Actions.Name: List Supported Environment Currencies
Actions.Description: Returns a list of supported Currencies based on the location.

Actions.Name: List Supported Environment Languages
Actions.Description: Returns a list of supported Languages based on the location.

Actions.Name: List DLP Policies V2
Actions.Description: Returns an list of all DLP policies the account can access.

Actions.Name: List Supported Locations
Actions.Description: Returns a list of Locations where BAP service is supported.

Actions.Name: List Unblockable Connectors
Actions.Description: Returns a list of connectors that cannot be blocked with a DLP policy.

Actions.Name: List Virtual Connectors
Actions.Description: Returns a list of virtual connectors.
